alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 3:16PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will likely begin Friday afternoon but will likely not accumulate on surfaces until later Friday evening. Snow amounts will depend on how quickly snow diminishes Friday night, which remains uncertain. One to 4 inches possible through late Friday evening, with amounts greater than 6 inches possible if snow persists into Saturday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
